thread.title: Most Gun Owners Don't Belong To The NRA — And They Don’t Agree With It Either
thread.title_full: Most Gun Owners Don't Belong To The NRA — And They Don’t Agree With It Either - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Most Gun Owners Don't Belong To The NRA — And They Don’t Agree With It Either
text: It's widely acknowledged that the National Rifle Association is one of the nation's most influential advocacy groups. They've successfully lobbied against the expansion of federal gun control policies in the post-Newtown era, and supported numerous state-level policy changes that broadened access to guns. Through campaign donations and popular legislator scorecards they exert considerable influence on federal gun law making. -- This feed and its contents are the property of The Huffington Post, and use is subject to our terms.
